log
Class LogImpl

java.lang.Object
  log.LogImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Log
public class LogImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Log

This is an implementation of a log. It's a singleton, so there can be only one log in the system. This log singleton implementation is thread-safe. It enables writing file change events to the log, along with timestamps. It also enables getting all messages sorted by timestamp and clearing the log.

The log works with a DB/Text File/XML/Log4J (TBD) TODO: Choose a method

Author:
Or Shwartz
